mapper.select: {call UPA_SEARCH_KWD_LOG_STAT_SEL( #{startDt, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.util.Date}, #{endDt, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=java.util.Date}, #{keyword, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{tabDiv, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{page, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=integer}, #{size, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=integer}, #{useTotal, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{order, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{dir, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=string}, #{total, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER, javaType=java.lang.Long} ) }
